title: Degrees of freedom for response and gender

content.question: A survey was conducted in which both men and women were asked a question about a current issue. Possible responses to this question were “in favor of,” “not in favor of,” or “no opinion.” A chi-square test is to be used to determine whether the response to this question is independent of gender. The number of degrees of freedom for the chi-square test in this situation is

topic.text: 8.6: Carrying Out a Chi-Square Test for Homogeneity or Independence

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Calculate a test statistic and find a p-value, provided conditions for inference are met.
